title: Why are modern Greeks so looked upon? - Quora

response.answer_text: Looked upon? But so are their European partners British and French. Because Greeks and British and Italians and French are somehow the cornerstone of Europe and the western world. Greece has had the 11-century old glorious Byzantine empire and the great antiquity, and Britain and France had the more recent industrial and artistic power contributing to our western world. And Italy of course. Now, when ti comes to US Americans, they look down on most Europeans, whether Brits or Greeks or Austrians.
